message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate it, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. Would you be willing to come down to $9000?
I understand you're looking to spend a bit less, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $9500.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $9500 is still a little more than I'm comfortable with.  How about we settle at $9250? It's a good middle ground for both of us.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $9350. I think this is as low as I can go without losing money on the deal.
